experience.description: Senja framework (SELENIUM + JAVA) is a portable software testing for web applications. It provides a record/playback tool for authoring tests. It bases on the SELENIUM framework, it support for the QC engineer several keywords to create test-scripts and automate to test.
responsibilities: Developing in new software module development.
